body_html: I use somewhat complex multi-head network with lots of conditionals in the forward function. The conditionals do not change during the training of the corresponding parts of the network, so I could unroll all of the conditionals into multiple classes, but that would create a lot of classes and clutter in the code, making it less readable and manageable. So, I am hoping that I could JIT compile the forward function on demand, possibly multiple times during different phases of training when the conditionals are known to be static? So, I guess decorating the whole class will not work in my case.
